com.aestasit.ssh.dsl
[Groovy] Class SessionDelegate

java.lang.Object
  com.aestasit.ssh.dsl.SessionDelegate

@groovy.lang.Mixin([ScpMethods, ExecMethods])
class SessionDelegate

Closure delegate that is used to collect all SSH options and give access to other DSL delegates.

Authors:
Andrey Adamovich
